item.title: The Story Began
item.dc:creator: mybagelshack
item.content:encoded:
2serves 15 mins cooking By Anna Molly
Ingredients
Squash, peeled and cut into 1-2cm dice 400g
Olive oil 1 tbsp
Spinach 300g
Egg 1
Chopped toasted walnutssea saltfreshly ground black pepper 40g

item.title: A simple autumnal bake
item.dc:creator: mybagelshack
item.description: Boudin ham hock chicken,. Leberkas ham sausage doner pastrami porchetta tri-tip boudin shankle. Meatball shoulder rump spare ribs tongue venison short ribs. Flank landjaeger brisket leberkas bacon kielbasa shank meatball, fatback t-bone pork biltong boudin. Hamburger strip steak ribeye pastrami tenderloin.
item.content:encoded: Boudin ham hock chicken,. Leberkas ham sausage doner pastrami porchetta tri-tip boudin shankle. Meatball shoulder rump spare ribs tongue venison short ribs. Flank landjaeger brisket leberkas bacon kielbasa shank meatball, fatback t-bone pork biltong boudin. Hamburger strip steak ribeye pastrami tenderloin.

item.title: A simple autumnal bake combining of favourite
item.dc:creator: mybagelshack
item.description: Feel free to replace the plain flour with buckwheat flour – the dumplings will be a little chewier, but in a good way.
item.content:encoded: Feel free to replace the plain flour with buckwheat flour – the dumplings will be a little chewier, but in a good way.
